Class DBQuiz

java.lang.Object
DATABASE.DBQuiz
public class DBQuiz extends Object
Handles quiz-specific database operations including game play, scoring, leaderboards, and player statistics. This class is for quiz game functionality.

  • Method Details

    • getQuestionsByDifficulty

      public static List<Question> getQuestionsByDifficulty(String difficulty, int limit)
      Retrieves questions based on difficulty level with random ordering.
      Parameters:
      difficulty - The difficulty level (Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced)
      limit - The maximum number of questions to retrieve
      Returns:
      List of Question objects for the specified difficulty
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • saveScore

      public static boolean saveScore(int userId, String difficulty, int round, int score, int totalQuestions)
      Saves a player score to the database and update to database.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user
      difficulty - The difficulty level played
      round - The number of round
      score - The score achieved
      totalQuestions - Total questions in the round
      Returns:
      true if save successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getUserScores

      public static List<String[]> getUserScores(int userId)
      Retrieves all scores for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user
      Returns:
      List of score data containing difficulty, round, score, success_rate and date
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getLeaderboard

      public static List<String[]> getLeaderboard(int limit)
      Retrieves the leaderboard of all players.
      Parameters:
      limit - The maximum number of players to return
      Returns:
      List of player data containing rank, username, games played, correct answers, success rate and last active
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getUserId

      public static int getUserId(String username)
      Retrieves user ID by username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to search for
      Returns:
      User ID if found, 1 (admin ID) as fallback if not found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • registerUser

      public static boolean registerUser(String username, String password, String email)
      Registers a new user in the system.
      Parameters:
      username - The desired username
      password - The user's password
      email - The user's email address
      Returns:
      true if registration successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • clearUserScores

      public static boolean clearUserScores(int userId)
      Clears all scores for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user
      Returns:
      true if scores were cleared, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getLeaderboardByDifficulty

      public static List<String[]> getLeaderboardByDifficulty(String difficulty, int limit)
      Retrieves leaderboard filtered by difficulty level.
      Parameters:
      difficulty - The difficulty level to filter by (or "All" for all difficulties)
      limit - The maximum number of players to return
      Returns:
      List of player data with detailed statistics
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getUserRank

      public static String getUserRank(String username, String difficulty)
      Retrieves a user's rank for a specific difficulty level.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to check rank for
      difficulty - The difficulty level
      Returns:
      Formatted string containing rank information or error message
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getAllPlayers

      public static List<String[]> getAllPlayers()
      Retrieves all players in the system for admin panel.
      Returns:
      List of player data containing ID, username and email
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getAllStatistics

      public static List<String[]> getAllStatistics()
      Retrieves all statistics for admin panel display.
      Returns:
      List of statistic arrays containing ID, username and stats
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getPlayerDetailedStats

      public static Map<String,String> getPlayerDetailedStats(int userId)
      Retrieves detailed statistics for a specific player.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user
      Returns:
      Map containing detailed statistics (games played, questions attempted, best score, etc.)
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
